attributes.action: give NHS workers a better deal
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: at the moment nurses and other NHS workers are so hard worked that they dont have time to take their proper breaks or eat properly.most of the time they do not get a break at all due to low staffing levels.The health of NHS workers is beginning to suffer because of this.We would like this addressed before they suffer long term health issues due to not eating properly or drinking enough.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
